inicio.title: Full Stack Developer
inicio.description: Experience in web and cross-platform applications

about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: I am a passionate software developer with previous experience in the sector.
about.paragraph2: I am looking for technological challenges and opportunities to continue growing in the world of software development. Contact me to explore new possibilities together!

contact.title: Contact me
contact.subtitle: Don't hesitate to contact me. Here are my contact methods.

experience_details.bitbox_p1: As a developer at Bitboxer, I have been responsible for analyzing and developing parts of applications in both the ERP and different projects. I have held meetings with external projects in English.
experience_details.bitbox_p2: I have worked in a team using tools such as Git and Subversion, developing with technologies such as Java, JavaScript, React, Expo, and Spring Boot.
experience_details.bitbox_p3: I have also made modifications to libraries and gone through the entire development process: analysis, documentation, development, and problem solving.
experience_details.ashotel_p1: Development and updating of WordPress websites with PHP backend, improving user experience.
experience_details.ashotel_p2: Automation of tasks improving the productivity of my colleagues using TypeScript to create automations in Excel and Microsoft Power Automate in order to simplify internal processes.
experience_details.ashotel_p3: Adoption of a leadership role during the development of a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) in Power Apps, with the aim of optimizing tasks and increasing operational efficiency in the company.
experience_details.ciac_p1: Optimization of the speed and efficiency of dropdown lists in our application using loading techniques, lazy load, and caching.
experience_details.ciac_p2: Adoption of a leadership role in the successful creation of a new section of the application, creating new functionalities for it.

project_details.ofertalert_p1: Real-time offer tracking web application. With OfertAlert, you can enter a link and receive email notifications every time the associated item is on sale.

experience_jobs.ciac: CENTRO DE INFORMÁTICA Y ANÁLISIS DE CANARIAS SL
